analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_contracts/0x951f614f81da09c90e6187a14b759f98ed9e7490.sol#306-307) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_contracts/0x951f614f81da09c90e6187a14b759f98ed9e7490.sol#484-502)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x951f614f81da09c90e6187a14b759f98ed9e7490.sol#587-596)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x951f614f81da09c90e6187a14b759f98ed9e7490.sol#653-660) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0x951f614f81da09c90e6187a14b759f98ed9e7490.sol#427-444):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_contracts/0x951f614f81da09c90e6187a14b759f98ed9e7490.sol#439-440)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_contracts/0x951f614f81da09c90e6187a14b759f98ed9e7490.sol#442)
